NEXTUP.SheetPositionOffset: An amount to offset the sheet
NEXTUP.SheetPositionOffsetHint: Offset the sheet from the selected position in the x and y direction (in pixels)
NEXTUP.OpenActorTypeHint: Which actor types should be automatically opened
NEXTUP.CloseActorTypeHint: Which actor types should be automatically closed
NEXTUP.CloseCombatantFilterHint: Which combatants sheets should be automatically closed
NEXTUP.CloseCombatEndHint: Close all actor sheets on combat end
NEXTUP.PopoutActorHint: Pops out the actor sheet using the `Popout` module
NEXTUP.PanningClientsHint: Enables clients to pan to tokens they have line of sight too. Requires clients to enable on their side (this includes the GM client)
NEXTUP.RemovePin: Remove Pin Icon From Character Sheets
NEXTUP.AnimationSpeedHint: Seconds per full rotation, 0 is no rotation
NEXTUP.MarkerRatioHint: How many squares/hexes does the marker extend past the tokens border
NEXTUP.RenderIconHint: Render the turn marker icon above the token image
NEXTUP.StarTurnMarkerHint: Adds an icon indicate a tokens start position
NEXTUP.StartRatioHint: Ratio compared to token height/width for icon type marker
